title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: You can slide the slider to determine the position and size. Multiple forms, horizontal, vertical, and range sliders.

title: vertical mode
content: The vertical mode of the slider is displayed by setting the vertical attribute. landscape mode by default) In vertical mode, you can set the height of the component by calling height
findIntroStr: You can slide the slider to determine the position and size. Multiple forms, horizontal, vertical, and range sliders.

title: Maximum/Minimum
content: Set min max to set the value range of the slider.
findIntroStr: You can slide the slider to determine the position and size. Multiple forms, horizontal, vertical, and range sliders.

title: Current Value

title: Range Selection
content: Set the initial range selection for the array through v-model
findIntroStr: You can slide the slider to determine the position and size. Multiple forms, horizontal, vertical, and range sliders.

title: Text box mode
content: Enable the slider text box mode by configuring show-input
findIntroStr: You can slide the slider to determine the position and size. Multiple forms, horizontal, vertical, and range sliders.

title: Shortcut Key Operations
content: Set the total number of steps. That is, when you press the shortcut key PageDown or PageUp, the moving distance is (Maximum value - Minimum value)/Number of pages
findIntroStr: You can slide the slider to determine the position and size. Multiple forms, horizontal, vertical, and range sliders.

title: Disabled
content: Set the attribute disabled to disable the sliding slider
findIntroStr: You can slide the slider to determine the position and size. Multiple forms, horizontal, vertical, and range sliders.

title: Prompt
content: Disable the slider prompt by setting :show-tip="false" . (enabled by default)
findIntroStr: You can slide the slider to determine the position and size. Multiple forms, horizontal, vertical, and range sliders.

title: Step
content: Set step to configure the slider sliding step
